AT.name: Punch-Out!!™
AT.description: Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels. Was dem Amateur-Boxer Little Mac an Größe fehlt, macht er durch seine Entschlossenheit wieder wett. Mit seinem Trainer Doc Louis an seiner Seite macht sich Little Mac daran, große Siege einzufahren! Im NES-Klassiker Punch-Out!! muss dein winziger Faustkämpfer gegen verschiedene Rivalen wie den Franzosen Glass Joe mit dem Glaskinn, den Russen Soda Popinski mit den unerwarteten Schlägen und Super Macho Man, dem Schwergewicht aus Hollywood, antreten. Setze Geraden, Schläge zum Körper und Aufwärtshaken ein, um den Schwachpunkt deines Gegners auszumachen und ihn dann auszuknocken. Achte auch auf Marios Auftritt als Schiedsrichter!

AU.name: Punch-Out!!™
AU.description: This is the US version of the game. What rookie boxer Little Mac lacks in size, he makes up for in determination. And with trainer Doc Louis by his side, Little Mac is ready to win big! NES classic Punch-Out!! pits your pint-sized pugilist against such diverse rivals as the fragile-jawed Frenchman Glass Joe, sucker-punching Russian Soda Popinski and the Hollywood heavyweight Super Macho Man. Use jabs, body blows, hooks and uppercuts to discover your opponent's weak spot and make the knockout blow. Also, look out for an appearance by Mario as the referee!

BG.name: Punch-Out!!™
BG.description: This is the US version of the game. What rookie boxer Little Mac lacks in size, he makes up for in determination. And with trainer Doc Louis by his side, Little Mac is ready to win big! NES classic Punch-Out!! pits your pint-sized pugilist against such diverse rivals as the fragile-jawed Frenchman Glass Joe, sucker-punching Russian Soda Popinski and the Hollywood heavyweight Super Macho Man. Use jabs, body blows, hooks and uppercuts to discover your opponent's weak spot and make the knockout blow. Also, look out for an appearance by Mario as the referee!

BE.name: Punch-Out!!™
BE.description: Ceci est la version américaine du jeu. Little Mac a beau ne pas être très costaud, il n'en est pas moins déterminé ! Avec l'aide de son entraîneur, Doc Louis, il va se battre pour devenir le plus grand champion de boxe de tous les temps ! Dans Punch-Out!!, vous devrez triompher d'adversaires de plus en plus redoutables. Affrontez Glass Joe, le français douillet, Soda Popinski, un russe roublard, Super Macho Man, le poids lourd d'Hollywood, et d'autres boxeurs uniques en leur genre ! Trouvez le point faible de votre adversaire et mettez le K.O. avec vos directs, crochets et uppercuts. Mario est là pour arbitrer les combats !

ES.name: Punch-Out!!™
ES.description: Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego. Puede que a Little Mac le falte tamaño, pero a este boxeador novel le sobran agallas y, gracias a los consejos de Doc Louis, su entrenador personal, está preparado para convertirse en la nueva sensación del ring. En el clásico de NES Punch-Out!, tu diminuto luchador se enfrenta a oponentes tan diversos como Glass Joe, un francés algo blandengue, Soda Popinski, un ruso que no duda en jugar sucio o Super Macho Man, todo un peso pesado en Hollywood. Utiliza directos, golpes al cuerpo, crochets y ganchos para descubrir el punto débil de tu enemigo y lánzale el golpe de gracia. ¡Además, contarás con un árbitro de excepción: el mismísimo Mario!

IT.name: Punch-Out!!™
IT.description: Questa è la versione americana del gioco. Little Mac sarà anche un peso piuma, ma ha determinazione da vendere! E con un allenatore come Doc Louis al suo fianco, è pronto a conseguire grandi vittorie! Punch Out!! vede il nostro piccolo pugile alle prese con svariati avversari, tra cui Glass Joe, pugile francese dalla mascella delicata, Soda Popinski, atleta russo noto per i suoi colpi bassi, e il peso massimo hollywoodiano, Super Macho Man. Colpisci con diretti, colpi allo stomaco, ganci e montanti per scoprire le debolezze dei tuoi avversari e sferrare il colpo finale. Tanti incontri avvincenti, resi ancora più divertenti da un arbitro d'eccezione: il mitico Mario!

NL.name: Punch-Out!!™
NL.description: Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel. Wat beginnende bokser Little Mac tekort komt aan lengte, maakt hij meer dan goed met vastberadenheid. Met trainer Doc Louis aan zijn zijde is Little Mac klaar voor het grote werk. In de NES-klassieker Punch-Out!! neemt jouw vuistgrote vechter het op tegen rivalen als Glass Joe, de Fransman met de zwakke kaak, de onberekenbare Rus Soda Popinski en Hollywood-zwaargewicht Super Macho Man. Gebruik lichaamsstoten, je linkse en rechtse directe en uppercuts om het zwakke punt van je tegenstander te ontdekken en de winnende stoot uit te delen. Met niemand minder dan Mario als scheidsrechter!

NZ.name: Punch-Out!!™
NZ.description: This is the US version of the game. What rookie boxer Little Mac lacks in size, he makes up for in determination. And with trainer Doc Louis by his side, Little Mac is ready to win big! NES classic Punch-Out!! pits your pint-sized pugilist against such diverse rivals as the fragile-jawed Frenchman Glass Joe, sucker-punching Russian Soda Popinski and the Hollywood heavyweight Super Macho Man. PL.name: Punch-Out!!™
PL.description: This is the US version of the game. What rookie boxer Little Mac lacks in size, he makes up for in determination. And with trainer Doc Louis by his side, Little Mac is ready to win big! NES classic Punch-Out!! pits your pint-sized pugilist against such diverse rivals as the fragile-jawed Frenchman Glass Joe, sucker-punching Russian Soda Popinski and the Hollywood heavyweight Super Macho Man. Use jabs, body blows, hooks and uppercuts to discover your opponent's weak spot and make the knockout blow. Also, look out for an appearance by Mario as the referee!

PT.name: Punch-Out!!™
PT.description: Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA. O que falta ao jovem pugilista Little Mac em tamanho, é certamente compensado com a sua determinação. Acompanhado pelo treinador Doc Louis, Little Mac está pronto para causar um grande impacto. No clássico NES Punch-Out!, o pequeno pugilista defronta vários adversários, tais como Frenchman Glass Joe, conhecido pelo seu frágil maxilar, Russian Soda Popinsky, famoso pelos seus golpes baixos, e Super Macho Man, o peso pesado de Hollywood. Usa diretos, golpes no corpo e ganchos para descobrires o ponto fraco do teu adversário até o deixares K.O. Além disso, está atento à nova faceta de Mario como árbitro!

RU.name: Punch-Out!!™
RU.description: Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США. Боксер Little Mac («Малыш» Мак) не вышел ростом, но упорства и воли к победе ему не занимать! С помощью своего тренера Doc Louis Малыш планирует добиться больших результатов. В игре Punch-Out!! нашего маленького героя ждут грозные соперники. Среди них – француз Glass Joe, который боится ударов в челюсть, русский Soda Popinski, не брезгующий запрещенными ударами, и голливудский тяжеловес Super Macho Man. Обрушьте на противников град джебов, ударов в корпус, хуков и апперкотов, найдите их слабые места и одержите победу в состязаниях! Судить поединки будет сам Марио!

SE.name: Punch-Out!!™
SE.description: This is the US version of the game. What rookie boxer Little Mac lacks in size, he makes up for in determination. And with trainer Doc Louis by his side, Little Mac is ready to win big! NES classic Punch-Out!! pits your pint-sized pugilist against such diverse rivals as the fragile-jawed Frenchman Glass Joe, sucker-punching Russian Soda Popinski and the Hollywood heavyweight Super Macho Man.
